Identifying Characteristics: Elongated fish with dorsal and anal fin located far back near the forked caudal fin
Back and sides olive green to brown, grading to white on belly
Sides overlain with yellow-green blotches which cause darker green background to form chainlike markings
Biology: Spawn in spring as soon as ice is out in marshy areas and shallow bays
Range: Range: east of the Appalachians from Nova Scotia south to Florida, west across the Gulf Coast to Texas
